languages.text: Replacements for damaged or diseased parts of the body, which improve on the abilities and powers of the human body and even extend life. All members of the Adeptus Mechanicus replace their impure flesh with sacred technology, but for most others a bionic replacement is more often a necessity due to injury or occupation.
languages.original_text: Аугментации заменяют поврежденные или пораженные болезнью органы, улучшая возможности человеческого тела и даже продляя жизнь их обладателям. Все члены Адептус Механикус заменяют свою нечестивую плоть священными технологиями, однако большинство людей заменяет свои органы бионическими аналогами из-за травм или для профессиональных нужд.

traits.locale_text: Replacements for damaged or diseased parts of the body, which improve on the abilities and powers of the human body and even extend life. All members of the Adeptus Mechanicus replace their impure flesh with sacred technology, but for most others a bionic replacement is more often a necessity due to injury or occupation.

Replacements for damaged or diseased parts of the body, which improve on the abilities and powers of the human body and even extend life. All members of the Adeptus Mechanicus replace their impure flesh with sacred technology, but for most others a bionic replacement is more often a necessity due to injury or occupation.

Replacements for damaged or diseased parts of the body, which improve on the abilities and powers of the human body and even extend life. All members of the Adeptus Mechanicus replace their impure flesh with sacred technology, but for most others a bionic replacement is more often a necessity due to injury or occupation.

languages.text: Аугментации заменяют поврежденные или пораженные болезнью органы, улучшая возможности человеческого тела и даже продляя жизнь их обладателям. Все члены Адептус Механикус заменяют свою нечестивую плоть священными технологиями, однако большинство людей заменяет свои органы бионическими аналогами из-за травм или для профессиональных нужд.

Ersatz für beschädigte oder kranke Körperteile, die die Fähigkeiten und Kräfte des Körpers verbessern und sogar das Leben verlängern. Alle Mitglieder des Adeptus Mechanicus ersetzen ihr unreines Fleisch durch heilige Technologie, aber für die meisten anderen ist ein bionischer Ersatz eher eine Notwendigkeit aufgrund einer Verletzung oder eines Berufs.
languages.original_text: Replacements for damaged or diseased parts of the body, which improve on the abilities and powers of the human body and even extend life. All members of the Adeptus Mechanicus replace their impure flesh with sacred technology, but for most others a bionic replacement is more often a necessity due to injury or occupation.

traits.locale_text: Ersatz für beschädigte oder kranke Körperteile, die die Fähigkeiten und Kräfte des Körpers verbessern und sogar das Leben verlängern. Alle Mitglieder des Adeptus Mechanicus ersetzen ihr unreines Fleisch durch heilige Technologie, aber für die meisten anderen ist ein bionischer Ersatz eher eine Notwendigkeit aufgrund einer Verletzung oder eines Berufs.

languages.text: Composants permettant de remplacer les parties endommagées ou malades du corps. Ils améliorent les capacités et les pouvoirs du corps humain et peuvent même prolonger la vie. Tous les membres de l'Adeptus Mechanicus se font implanter des composants technologiques sacrés pour remplacer leur chair impure. Les autres, en revanche, n'ont recours à un remplacement bionique qu'en cas de nécessité, suite à une lésion ou pour répondre aux exigences de leur métier, par exemple.
languages.original_text: Replacements for damaged or diseased parts of the body, which improve on the abilities and powers of the human body and even extend life. All members of the Adeptus Mechanicus replace their impure flesh with sacred technology, but for most others a bionic replacement is more often a necessity due to injury or occupation.

traits.locale_text: Composants permettant de remplacer les parties endommagées ou malades du corps. Ceux-ci améliorent les capacités et les pouvoirs du corps humain et peuvent même prolonger la vie. Tous les membres de l'Adeptus Mechanicus se font implanter des composants technologiques sacrés pour remplacer leur chair impure. Les autres, en revanche, n'ont recours à un remplacement bionique qu'en cas de nécessité, suite à une blessure ou pour répondre aux exigences de leur métier par exemple.

languages.text: 机械制成的替代品，用来替代身体受损或患病部位，可以提高人体的能力和力量，甚至延长寿命。机械修会的所有成员都会用神圣的机械装置替代不纯洁的肉体，而对绝大多数其他人而言，他们更常使用仿生的植入物，用来替代受伤的身体部分或用于工作目的。
languages.original_text: Replacements for damaged or diseased parts of the body, which improve on the abilities and powers of the human body and even extend life. All members of the Adeptus Mechanicus replace their impure flesh with sacred technology, but for most others a bionic replacement is more often a necessity due to injury or occupation.

traits.locale_text: 机械制成的替代品，用来替代身体受损或患病部位，可以提高人体的能力和力量，甚至延长寿命。机械修会的所有成员都会用神圣的机械装置替代不纯洁的肉体，而对绝大多数其他人而言，他们更常使用仿生的植入物，用来替代受伤的身体部分或用于工作目的。

languages.text: 損傷したり病気になったりした身体の部位を補うもので、人体の能力やパワーを向上させ、延命効果もある。帝国技術局の全メンバーは神聖なテクノロジーで不純な肉体を置換するが、それ以外の大方のメンバーに関しては、機械義体置換は怪我や職業のために必要とすることが多い。
languages.original_text: Replacements for damaged or diseased parts of the body, which improve on the abilities and powers of the human body and even extend life. All members of the Adeptus Mechanicus replace their impure flesh with sacred technology, but for most others a bionic replacement is more often a necessity due to injury or occupation.

traits.locale_text: 損傷したり病気になったりした身体の部位を補うもので、人体の能力やパワーを向上させ、延命効果もある。帝国技術局の全メンバーは神聖なテクノロジーで不純な肉体を置換するが、それ以外の大方のメンバーに関しては、機械義体置換は怪我や職業のために必要とすることが多い。

languages.text: Repuestos de partes dañadas o muertas del cuerpo humano. Mejoran las capacidades y los poderes del organismo e incluso prolongan la esperanza de vida. Todos los miembros del Adeptus Mechanicus reemplazan su carne impura con tecnología sagrada, pero, para la mayoría de los ajenos a esta institución, los reemplazos biónicos son más bien una imposición a causa de una lesión o un puesto de trabajo.
languages.original_text: Replacements for damaged or diseased parts of the body, which improve on the abilities and powers of the human body and even extend life. All members of the Adeptus Mechanicus replace their impure flesh with sacred technology, but for most others a bionic replacement is more often a necessity due to injury or occupation.

traits.locale_text: Repuestos de partes dañadas o muertas del cuerpo humano. Mejoran las capacidades y los poderes del organismo e incluso prolongan la esperanza de vida. Todos los miembros del Adeptus Mechanicus reemplazan su carne impura con tecnología sagrada, pero, para la mayoría de los ajenos a esta institución, los reemplazos biónicos son más bien una imposición a causa de una lesión o un puesto de trabajo.

languages.text: Bedenin hasar görmüş veya hastalıklı kısımlarına takılarak insan vücudunun kabiliyetlerini ve güçlerini geliştiren, hatta yaşam süresini uzatan ikame parçalar. Adeptus Mechanicus'un tüm üyeleri, saf olmayan etlerini kutsal teknolojiyle değiştirseler de çoğu insan için yaralanma veya mesleki sebeplerle organlarını biyonik ikameleriyle değiştirmek bir ihtiyaçtır.
languages.original_text: Replacements for damaged or diseased parts of the body, which improve on the abilities and powers of the human body and even extend life. All members of the Adeptus Mechanicus replace their impure flesh with sacred technology, but for most others a bionic replacement is more often a necessity due to injury or occupation.
